A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow.  What's with all the haters?  Seriously...  Yes\, it's not one of the revered original trilogy\, but it's a damn good movie\, taken on its own merits.  It's not without problems\, but thoroughly entertaining--I didn't look at my watch once (as I often do).  One star reviewers need to stop taking themselves so seriously\, grow up\, get a sense of humor\, or deal with whatever issue forced the bug so far up their ass.
